II fldgi – wêlrK
 msgqj  
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 540
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
539- B 081186 — 353 (2017/07)
D 1 -
     msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ... ... ...  —
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... ... —

úúO oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
   fuu .eiÜ m;%h  www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka  nd.; l< yel'  
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs  
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2017 cQ,s ui 28 jeks Èk m< lrk .eiÜ 
m;%fha oekaùï 2017 cQ,s ui 14 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï 
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh bf,lafg%dksl 
iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2017'07'07
540  
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - ;siaiuydrduh
jir 05g jeä wjika kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o j¾I 05lg jvd mer‚ my; Wmf,aLkfha i`oyka kvq jd¾;d ^wmrdO& 
2017'10'06 jeks Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
   fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvq jd¾;djkays iy;sl msgm;la fyda tys hï fldgil 
msgm;la fyda f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la fyda ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï tA i|yd b,a,Sula 2017'10'06 jeks Èkg fmr fuu 
wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
   tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2017'10'06 jeks Èfkka miqj fuu 
wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
 wd¾' ví' wd¾' Ô' à' hQ' rdcmlaI"
 Èid úksiqre$ufyia;%d;a"
 ;siaiuydrduh'
2017 cqks ui 19 jeks Èk"

07-45$1

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2017'07'07

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
±kaùï iy m%ldYkhka i|yd wh lrkq ,nk 
ixfYdaê; .dia;=
2013 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk isg 
^iEu isl=rdod Èkhkays .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'&
 
 1'  ish¨ u ±kaùï iy m%ldYkhka m< lrkq ,nkafka m%isoaO lrkakdf.a j.lSu msgh' 
 2'  fm!oa.,sl m<lrkakkaf.a ish¨ u ±kaùï iy m%ldYk ta i|yd kshñ; iïmQ¾K .dia;=j;a  iu. fld<U 08" fnd/,a," Y%S

.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí' 
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ 
m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'  
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha  
th m< l< hq;= kï wjYH ixfYdaOkhka lr wdmiq  túh hq;=h' rcfha  uqøKd,h fj; ;eme,a  u.ska tjk ±kaùï  wm%udoj tys 
,eîug iEfyk fõ,djla §  ;eme,a lsÍfuka  jqjukd  .eiÜ m;%hg ±kaùu we;=<;a  fjkjd fuka u th ish¨ fokdf.a u myiqjg 
o fya;= jk nj i<lkak'

fl<ska u f.úh hq;=h'
